page.title: 09Crane Moor
page.content: Crane Moor is a rather isolated place with only two buses in each direction on a weekday and four on a Saturday. There are about 97 houses in the area. Alsothere are five farms around the village,Toad Hall Farm, Crane Greave Farm, Cliffe Farm, Manor Farm and Danes Lane Farm which local people call Dance Lane Farm. Three of these are dairy farms, one is a mixed farmand another is a beef farm. At the bottom of the village in Cliffe Avenue there are some Airey houses. These were temporarily prefabricated houses put up after the Second World War. As they become empty they are being boarded up ready to be pulled down bEcause they are considered dangerous.
